name: Chronautical (itch)
description:
CHRONAUTICAL

In this narrative-driven sci-fi mystery, investigate across space and time to uncover clues and unravel the secrets of a star system that has disappeared.

Chronautical is built around the idea of moving forward and backwards through time to solve a narrative mystery, talking and interacting with people to see how they change in time due to your actions. Fall in love with the mysterious stranger who saved your life and discover the secrets of time travel by piecing together the Great Machine, previously known only in myths. Visit the different planets and time periods in whatever order you decide to create unique experiences from player to player.

The current release is the game's BETA, so bugs are to be expected. Feel free to let us know in the comments if you encounter something game breaking! We plan to continue development and will release patches as necessary. The game currently just contains the prologue of the story.  

We hope to release later chapters as free DLC to this initial purchase. However, at the end of the quarter development will be on hiatus as multiple team members will be moving to other locations. We'll be sure to keep everyone updated via our socials as the situation develops.
